alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Columbia and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Suwannee Valley, or near White Springs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Belmont, Five Points and Watertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
